content.p: Open days are a great way to learn more about your course, meet academics and chat to students. They also help you to get a feel for the place, so that you can decide whether life as a Nottingham student is right for you. Our next in-person open days are in summer 2025. In the meantime you can visit campus by booking a campus tour or find out more about your course at a virtual open day. Our next open days will take place on: Please check back soon to register your interest in our open days. In the meantime, you can visit our campus by booking a campus tour. Join our Virtual Open Day, to find out more about life at Nottingham from anywhere in the world. Sutton Bonington is surrounded by the beautiful and peaceful countryside. The campus has world-leading labs and specialist facilities, a working dairy centre and commercial farm.
